posts.raw_content: Wife and I spent ten days in Tennessee for her birthday and to see if we want to live there, Nashville, Knoxville and Gatlinburg and the surrounding areas of each to get a feel for the areas. Nashville is trash and I mean hot fucking trash. Nashville is like country music meets the Kardashians with a big dash of tranny shit tossed in. Fucking drag queen tours, troons walking about and prices on par with NewYork. It was literally a gayer version of Vegas minus the casinos.  I can not begin to describe how impossible it should be to have a miserable time with drunken college age and milf age women dressed skimpy walking about but Nashville has done it in spades. The only saving grace was unlike other tourist destinations I have been to no one was shot or stabbed which I credit the demographics alone for. But like most metros the ghetto is literally just outside the area. The only shining beacon was a steak house in the affluent area which the patrons didn't seem to happy for us to eat in called Sperry's belle Mede, To be fair even though I and the wife have done well for ourselves we don't dress the part because fuck a suit and tie. Retro rifle shirts and cargo shorts are about all ill wear (the mohawk probably doesn't help either). Knoxville was ok but not what we were looking for but the people in the surrounding areas were nice and accommodating. Eastern Tennessee however is beautiful, People still speak like they did when I was growing up in Georgia, kind of made me feel nostalgic. Trump flags everywhere, I didn't see a single drag queen or troon though  I am sure they are there just not celebrated Sevierville and the surrounding areas make the mountains look like a fucking Norman Rockwell painting. Gatlinburg never disappoints but its too crowded to live in. I think we are going to eastern Tennessee . Also went for a day in Kentucky for the ark experience lovely area and beautiful but the economy there is non existent.
posts.author: 2021Is1776
posts.title: Just got back from Tennessee.  Looking to move there- a few observations.
posts.content: Wife and I spent ten days in Tennessee for her birthday and to see if we want to live there, Nashville, Knoxville and Gatlinburg and the surrounding areas of each to get a feel for the areas. Nashville is trash and I mean hot fucking trash. Nashville is like country music meets the Kardashians with a big dash of tranny shit tossed in. Fucking drag queen tours, troons walking about and prices on par with NewYork. It was literally a gayer version of Vegas minus the casinos. I can not begin to describe how impossible it should be to have a miserable time with drunken college age and milf age women dressed skimpy walking about but Nashville has done it in spades. The only saving grace was unlike other tourist destinations I have been to no one was shot or stabbed which I credit the demographics alone for. But like most metros the ghetto is literally just outside the area. The only shining beacon was a steak house in the affluent area which the patrons didn't seem to happy for us to eat in called Sperry's belle Mede, To be fair even though I and the wife have done well for ourselves we don't dress the part because fuck a suit and tie. Retro rifle shirts and cargo shorts are about all ill wear (the mohawk probably doesn't help either). Knoxville was ok but not what we were looking for but the people in the surrounding areas were nice and accommodating. Eastern Tennessee however is beautiful, People still speak like they did when I was growing up in Georgia, kind of made me feel nostalgic. Trump flags everywhere, I didn't see a single drag queen or troon though I am sure they are there just not celebrated Sevierville and the surrounding areas make the mountains look like a fucking Norman Rockwell painting. Gatlinburg never disappoints but its too crowded to live in. I think we are going to eastern Tennessee . Also went for a day in Kentucky for the ark experience lovely area and beautiful but the economy there is non existent.
